title: Create Gradle Project
instructions:
Create a build.gradle.kts file that:
1. Uses the Java plugin
2. Sets Java version to 23
3. Adds JUnit 5 as a test dependency
4. Configures the test task to use JUnit Platform

hints.text: Use the 'java' plugin for Java projects
useJUnitPlatform() tells Gradle to use JUnit 5
